Package org.apache.zookeeper.server.backup.monitoring

Interface BackupMXBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackupBean
    public interface BackupMXBean
    ZK backup MBean

    • Method Summary

      long getLastSnapshotIterationDuration()
      Gauge
      long getLastTxnLogIterationDuration()
      Gauge
      long getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulSnapshotIteration()
      Counter, reset when a successful backup iteration is completed This metric can be used for alerts.
      long getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulTxnLogIteration()
      Counter
      int getNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpLastIteration()
      Gauge
      int getNumConsecutiveFailedSnapshotIterations()
      Counter, reset when a successful backup iteration is completed For example: if backup iteration A fails, the number is 1; if next backup iteration B succeeds, the number is reset to 0.
      int getNumConsecutiveFailedTxnLogIterations()
      Counter For example: if backup iteration A fails, the number is 1; if next backup iteration B succeeds, the number is reset to 0.
      boolean getSnapshotBackupActiveStatus()
      Gauge
      boolean getTxnLogBackupActiveStatus()
      Gauge

    • Method Detail

      • getNumConsecutiveFailedSnapshotIterations

        int getNumConsecutiveFailedSnapshotIterations()
        Counter, reset when a successful backup iteration is completed For example: if backup iteration A fails, the number is 1; if next backup iteration B succeeds, the number is reset to 0. If A fails, the number is 1; if then B fails too, the number is incremented to 2. This metric can be used for alerts.
        Returns:
        Number of consecutive snapshot backup errors since last successful snapshot backup iteration

      • getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulSnapshotIteration

        long getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulSnapshotIteration()
        Counter, reset when a successful backup iteration is completed This metric can be used for alerts.
        Returns:
        Time passed (minutes) since last successful snapshot backup iteration

      • getSnapshotBackupActiveStatus

        boolean getSnapshotBackupActiveStatus()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        If snapshot backup is currently actively ongoing

      • getLastSnapshotIterationDuration

        long getLastSnapshotIterationDuration()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        How long it took to complete the last snapshot backup iteration

      • getNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpLastIteration

        int getNumberOfSnapshotFilesBackedUpLastIteration()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        Number of snapshot files that were backed up to backup storage in last snapshot backup iteration

      • getNumConsecutiveFailedTxnLogIterations

        int getNumConsecutiveFailedTxnLogIterations()
        Counter For example: if backup iteration A fails, the number is 1; if next backup iteration B succeeds, the number is reset to 0. If A fails, the number is 1; if then B fails too, the number is incremented to 2.
        Returns:
        Number of consecutive txn log backup errors since last successful txn log backup iteration

      • getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulTxnLogIteration

        long getMinutesSinceLastSuccessfulTxnLogIteration()
        Counter
        Returns:
        Time passed (minutes) since last successful txn log backup iteration

      • getTxnLogBackupActiveStatus

        boolean getTxnLogBackupActiveStatus()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        If txn log backup is currently actively ongoing

      • getLastTxnLogIterationDuration

        long getLastTxnLogIterationDuration()
        Gauge
        Returns:
        How long it took to complete the last txn log backup iteration
